block_comment: This block of code performs the function of generating a mask from a value called "mtrans_reg1". It achieves its function by implementing a bitwise shift operation. Specifically, it assigns the "mtrans_reg2_mask" register with the result of shifting '1' to the left by the number of places indicated by the value of "mtrans_reg1". By this way, a mask of 1's is created starting from the lowermost bit to the dictated position.
